creator: ps@nomensa.com
text:
After speaking on the list the suggestion from andreas seems good ("Replacing
client-side redirects with server-side" thread) and it works for me (with very
limited testing). So far its just working for the create usecase but there seems
to be no reason why this couldn't be used elsewhere.

It is very similar to the fallback module and the arguments for the sitemap
redirect are: area, document-id, language. This seems all that is neccesary for
the document helper to contruct the url and send the redirect to the client. It
uses the same code (more or less) as the redirect.xsp document helper code.

A first attempt so see how it goes...
